name: The Hommies
description:
** IMPORTANT ** This game requires an iPad 2 (or newer), iPhone 4s (or newer), or iPod touch 5th Generation.

The Hommies are in trouble and you are the chosen one to save them from the many dangers of space. They have so little time, what are you waiting for?

Some bad guys love destroying entire planets, these poor Hommies lived in peace and harmony once, but now they have to deal with the fact that there is no oxygen in space! help them get to their ships so they can have another chance to survive.

Take each Hommie to it's corresponding ship, battle enemies and bosses, discover new worlds, upgrade your power ups, choose between different game modes, unlock secret characters, compete with your friends for the maximum score and play tons of amazing levels!
developers: NeverEnding Media S. de R.L., C.V.
publishers: Never Ending Media, S. de R.L., C.V
